name: Echo Dot
description: the speaker you control with your voice

name: Google Nest
description: controls your smart home privately and securely

name: Google Home
description: It's powered by the Google Assistant, so you can ask it questions and tell it to do things

name: Apple HomePod mini
description: offers Siri voice assistance and smart home control in an attractive little orb design

name: Sonos Move
description: a powerful multi-room smart speaker with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant voice control, as well as a durable, battery-powered design you can use anywhere

name: Ring
description: improved motion detection and enhanced wifi, you can keep an eye on what's happening anytime, from anywhere

name: Google Nest Doorbell
description: See what's happening at your door from anywhere, and get alerts about important activity, like a visitor or package delivery

name: Efuy Video Doorbell
description: Wi-Fi Video Doorbell Kit, 1080p-Grade Resolution, 120-day Battery, No Monthly Fees, Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, Free Wireless Chime

name: Blink
description: Wired or wire free, Two way audio, HD video and Alexa Enabled

name: Google Nest
description: Meet the Nest Thermostat, the helpful thermostat with a cozy price

name: Ecobee3
description: The smarter Wi-Fi thermostat that delivers unparalleled value, control and comfort.

name: Amazon Smart Thermostat
description: Alexa can do the programming for you, updating the temperature to keep you comfortable

name: Emerson Sensi
description: You can save about 23% of HVAC energy consumption with features like flexible scheduling, geofencing and remote access using your smartphone, tablet or PC

name: Honeywell Home
description: Lets you choose the temperature, schedule, display color and the devices you use to control it all

name: Philips Hue
description: Get bright cool light, warm white light, and 16 million colors with the Philips Hue 75W A19 bulb

name: GE Cync
description: Use Cync Full Color Smart Bulb to change the vibe of any space in seconds

name: Ikea Tradfi
description: With a dimmable LED bulb you can adapt your lighting to different activities

name: Sengled
description: The three 800-lumen bulbs offer illumination for a maximum of 8 hours per charge, while the included smart switch lets you turn the light on and off easily.
